title: Can't load into the game after champion select.
body: Once the loading screen comes up all i see is the league of legends symbol in the middle and a black screen behind it. The game then crashes and goes back to the client where i am forced to press reconnect but I still am not able to load into the game. Someone help me please, i am not getting banned but I am not able to play its very frustrating. Also, I have tried both clients, I tried fully reparing, and restarting my computer but nothing works. Oh and also, it doesn't work for any gamemode so no Aram, custom games, I even tried doing the tutorial. Help. I got a ban now  please help.

replies.body: Black screens usually result from connection problems, so your network is failing to reach the game servers properly.  Go through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your communication to the servers to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
What if I'm having the same issue, but I have no black screen?  After champion select the load screen simply never comes up for me.
that happens too sometimes for me after i have tried reconnecting a bunch of times.
I tried it but it didn't work for me );
Hey, could i at least get my bans removed if nobody is gonna help me with this probablem?

I am also having a similar issue with loading into the game after champion select. I have tried all the troubleshooting steps on your support site but still no luck. 

Specific Problem: After champion select (on any game mode), the timer counts down to zero and the game tries to switch from the launcher to the game. It crashes and gives me a bug splat error. It puts me back to the launcher with the reconnect button. When I press reconnect, it does the exact same thing with the same bugsplat. 

Things I have tried:
- Clean windows boot
- older graphic card drivers
- updating DirectX
- update Java
- compatibility mode
- run as administrator
- turning off firewall
- turning off anti-virus
- uninstalling/reinstalling LoL and cleaning the registry
- repairing LoL through launcher 

None of these things in any combination seem to get me into a game. I have leaverbuster now from the ARAM games I was trying to play, so I switched to custom games to try and troubleshoot but still not luck. Any advice would be appreciated. I'm at my wits end here. {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
